Gas Guru Simplified App Description

Brief:

Gas Guru is an essential app for anyone looking to save money on fuel. With real-time updates and detailed information at your fingertips, Gas Guru provides a comprehensive guide to finding the best gas prices near you, as well as additional station amenities.
